SEARCH
Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObserver
public class VirtualView extends Object implements GameObserver
Representation server-side of the client's view, it receives the updates from the model and forwards them to the client through the network.
